profile.title: Xogta Isticmaalaha
profile.mustLogin: Waa inaad gasho si aad u eegto dejimaha.
profile.autoTranslate: Si toos ah u turjun farriimaha
profile.avatarError: Khalad ku yimid soo rarista sawirka
profile.noPrivateKey: Fure gaar ah kama jiro qalabkan si loo dhoofiyo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Deji eray-sir si aad u sirgeliso kaydka:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kaydka la-sirgeliyey waa la soo dejiyey.
profile.importSuccess: Furaha gaarka ah qalabkan ayaa lagu soo dejiyey.
profile.importFailed: Soo dejintu way fashilantay (eray-sir khaldan ama fayl dhaawacan).
profile.keysRotated: Lammaane fure cusub ayaa la abuuray waxaana la soo geliyey furaha dadweynaha.
profile.importKey: Soo dejiso kaydka furaha ee la-sirgeliyey
profile.keyDisclaimer: Furahaaga gaarka ahi waligiis kama bixi qalabkan. Dhoofso nuqul eray-sir leh si aad ugu soo celiso qalab kale.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa Free—isticmaal Qorrax/Dayax hoosta. U cusboonaysii si aad u furto mawduucyo badan.
profile.backupDesc: Samee kaydyo eray-sir leh oo furayaasha ah, kuna soo celi qalab kale si aad u isu-dhafiso.
profile.notifyOnCopy: I ogeysii haddii farriimadayda la koobiyeeyo
profile.followHint: Sheekooyinkoodu waxay kaga muuqan doonaan quudka 'La raacay' haddii ay u daabacaan 'Followers' (ama 'Public').
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Qaybtu way ku guuldarreysatay inay soo shubato
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: U gudbi wicitaannada iyo qoraallada soo gelaya taleefankaaga ama iimaylka la xaqiijiyey. Wicitaannada/farriimaha baxaya waxay muujin karaan lambarkaaga Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Dooro qoraal ama qol si aad u bilowdo sheeko
chat.emptySubtitle: U dir farriin si aad u bilowdo sheeko.

status.filesNote: Ilaa 5 fayl. Caadiyan 24 saac ayay dhacaan.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Gali si aad u habayso dejimahaaga.

premium.heading: U gudub Premium
premium.description: Fur awoodaha iyo ka saar xayaysiisyada.

auth.headline: Farriin ammaan ah, caalami ah, turjumid degdeg ah
auth.description: Sirgelin dhammaad-illaa-dhammaad, turjumid ay AI ka caawiso, farriimo dabar-go'a, iyo wicitaanno cod/fiidiyow.

feature.translation: Si toos ah u turjun 100+ luuqadood
feature.privacy: Asturnaanta marka hore. Xogtaadu adigaa iska leh.

auth.desktopTip: Kombiyuutar mise waad ku jirtaa? Ku sawir taleefankaaga si aad u hesho app-ka.
auth.subhead: Wada sheekaysi gaar ah, la siryeeyey, lana turjumay — isla markiiba.
auth.tip: Waxaad Chatforia ka isticmaali kartaa qalab kasta — ama soo dejiso app-ka si aad u hesho khibrad fiican.
auth.scanHint: Ku sawir si aad u soo dejisato app-ka ama ugu furto biraawsarkaaga.

home.title: Bogga Hore
home.subheader: U dir farriin si aad u bilowdo sheeko.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Qor farriin si aad u dirto

press.title: Warbaahin
press.contact: Wixii su'aalo warbaahin ah, nala soo xiriir press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Wixii su'aalo warbaahin ah, nala soo xiriir press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia waa fariin-qaade ammaan ah oo leh turjumid degdeg ah iyo E2E sirgelin, si loogu fududeeyo wada sheekaysiga gaarka ah ee caalamiga ah.
press.assetsText: Astaamo, sawirro-shaashad iyo muuqaal alaab (soo socda).

careers.title: Shaqooyin
careers.intro: Waxaan nahay koox yar oo dhisaysa fariin-qaade gaar ah oo caalami ah. Haddii aad ka walaacdo sirgelinta, helitaanka, iyo UX qurxoon, waan jeclaan lahayn inaan kaa maqallo.
careers.openRoles: Shaqooyinka furan: Injineernimo (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Sida loo dalbado: U soo dir CV/linkiyo jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ku saabsan Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia waa fariin-qaade ammaan ah oo badan-luuqado leh, sirgelin dhammaad-illaa-dhammaad, turjumid degdeg ah, iyo wicitaanno cod/fiidiyow. Hadafkayagu waa fudud yahay: dadka ka caawi inay ku xirmaan — si ammaan ah, si gaar ah, iyo luuqad kasta.

values.privacy: Asturnaanta marka hore: E2E sirgelin asaas ahaan.
values.access: Helitaan qof walba: Si toos ah u turjun 100+ luuqadood.
values.control: Xakameyn: Farriimo dabar-go'a & calaamado akhris ikhtiyaari ah.

about.howDescription: Farriimaha waxa lagu sirgeliyaa qalabkaaga ka hor inta aanay bixin. Turjumid, kaydin, iyo isku-dhaf qalab waxaa loo habeeyey in wax yar ay server-radu arkaan.

advertise.title: Xayeysii Chatforia
advertise.description: Gaadh isticmaaleyaal firfircoon oo sheeko ku jira adigoo adeegsanaya boosaska xarrago leh ee ammaan-sumad. Waxaan bixinaa bannaano muuqaal sare leh, kafaala-qaadis, iyo xayeysiisyo gudaha. Macaamiisha Premium ma arkaan xayeysiis.

adsense.withPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsanaynaa Google AdSense. Haddii aad rabto inaad nagu beegsato Google Ads, isticmaal aqoonsiga daabacaha {{pubId}} oo codso meelayn lala maamulo ee cutubyada hoose. Kafaala-qaad toos ah wuu suurtagal yahay — isticmaal foomka.
adsense.noPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsanaynaa Google AdSense. Kafaala-qaad toos ahna wuu suurtagal yahay — isticmaal foomka hoose.

advertise.noPlacements: Meelayn lama habeyn weli. Ku dar ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Kulan joogto badan iyo joogitaan dheer gudaha UI-ga sheekada
why.brandSafe: Qaab-dhismeedyo ammaan-sumad; xaddidid soo noqnoqoshada ixtiraam leh
why.sponsoredMoments: Xilliyaal kafaala-qaad (tusaale, “Bilow Sheeko”) way suurtagal yihiin
why.deals: Heshiisyo toos ah ama programmatic via AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Mahadsanid! Codsigaaga wuu soo socdaa. Waanu ku soo jawaabi doonaa dhowaan.
form.missingRequired: Fadlan buuxi magac, iimayl, iyo farriin.
form.successToast: Mahadsanid! Waanu kula soo xiriiri doonaa dhawaan.
form.mailtoInfo: Waxaan furaynaa barnaamijka iimaylkaaga si aad u dirto codsiga…

upgrade.title: U Kordhi
upgrade.subtitle: Ka hel qorshaha kugu habboon: Plus = xayaysiis la’aan, Premium = awoodaha oo dhan.

scheduleBanner.title: Is-qoristu way dhammaan doontaa
scheduleBanner.body: Waxaad ku noqon doontaa Free maalinta

features.save25: Badbaadi ~25% marka la barbar dhigo bille
features.sameFeatures: Astaamo la mid ah kuwa Bille

gettingStarted.title: Sida Loo Bilaabo
gettingStarted.subtitle: Chatforia cusub baa tahay? Hage degdeg ah oo ku baraya aasaaska daqiiqado gudahood.

alert.text: Hagahan wuu koraan marka aan soo saarno astaamo cusub. Haddii wax ka maqan, nala soo xiriir adigoo mariya

section2.title: 2) Bilow farriimeynta
section2.item1: Abuur DM ama Koox oo dir farriintaada koowaad.
section2.item2: Isticmaal turjumid degdeg ah si aad ugu wada hadashaan 100+ luuqadood.
section2.item3: Tijaabi farriimaha dabar-go'a iyo calaamadaha akhriska: Profile → Asturnaanta.

section3.title: 3) U sii soco
section3.item2Part1: Ku xiro qalabyo dheeraad ah oo deji kaydyo la-siryeeyay gudaha

account.q: Sideen u abuuraa ama u soo ceshan karaa akoonkayga?
account.a: Soo dejiso app-ka ama isticmaal web, taabo “Abuur akoon”, xaqiiji iimaylka/taleefanka. Si aad u soo ceshato, isticmaal “Forgot password”.

privacy.q: Farriimaha ma E2E baa loo sirgeliyaa?
privacy.a: Haa. Farriimaha iyo wicitaannada si asaas ah waa E2E. Adiga iyo qofka aad la xiriirayso oo keliya ayaa akhriyi kara.

translate.q: Sidee ayey turjumiddu degdeg u shaqaysaa?
translate.a: Daar “Si toos ah u turjun” Dejimo → Muuqaal & Luuqad. Waxaan ku turjuntaa qalabka marka la taageero, haddii kale API-yo ammaan ah oo xog kooban ah.

contact.a: Nala soo xiriir support@chatforia.com. Ku dar sawirro-shaashad iyo nooca app-kaaga.

contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.successMsg: Mahadsanid—kooxdayadu iimayl ayay kugu soo jawaabi doontaa.
contact.errorSend: Lama diri karin. Fadlan u qor support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Qaanuunkaan Asturnaanta wuxuu sharxayaa sida Chatforia (“annaga”) u ururino, u adeegsanno, uguna wadaagno xogta marka aad isticmaasho app-yadeenna iyo adeeggeena. Waxaan u naqshadeynay Chatforia in la yareeyo xogta aan arki karno.

infoWeCollect.title: Xogta aan ururino
infoWeCollect.account: Xogta akoonka (tusaale, iimayl/taleefan) si loo abuuro una sugo akoonkaaga.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Nuxurka la sirgeliyey (farriimo/wicitaanno) waa E2E; annagu ma akhriyi karno.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Cilad/adeegsi sida warbixin jebin, nooca qalabka, ama falanqayn kooban si wax-qabadka loo hagaajiyo.

howWeUse.title: Sida aan xogta u adeegsanno
howWeUse.provide: Inaan adeegga bixinno oo aan sugno (gelid, ogaanshaha spam/xaaraan).

sharing.title: Wadaagid
sharing.body: Ma iibinno xogta shaqsiga. Waxaannu la wadaagi karnaa xog kooban hawl-fuliyayaal (tusaale, riix-ogaansii, falanqayn) heshiisyo adag hoostooda.

rights.title: Xuquuqdaada
rights.body: Iyadoo kuxiran gobolkaaga (tusaale, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), waxaad codsan kartaa marin, sixid, tirtirid, ama ka-bax qaarkood. La xiriir: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kaydinta xogta & amniga
retention.body: Waxaan haynaa waxa lagama maarmaanka u ah adeegsiga adeegga oo keliya, waxaanan adeegsannaa amni heer-warshadeed. Nuxurka E2E annagu ma furi karno.

children.title: Carruurta
children.body: Chatforia looma jeedin carruur ka yar 13 (ama sida sharciga degaankaagu qabo).

changes.title: Isbeddello
changes.body: Waxaan halkan ku daabici doonnaa cusboonaysiin waxaanan beddeli doonnaa taariikhda “Waxaa la cusboonaysiiyey”.

intro.body: Adigoo adeegsanaya Chatforia waxaad oggolaanaysaa Shuruudahaan. Haddii aadan oggolayn, ha adeegsan adeegga.

accounts.title: Akoonno
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Sii xog sax ah oo ilaali aqoonsiyadaada.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Adiga ayaa mas'uul ka ah waxa ka dhaca akoonkaaga.

acceptableUse.title: Isticmaalka la oggol yahay
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ha gelin nuxur sharci-daro, xadgudub, ama jebin xuquuq; ha sameyn spam ama adeegsiga toosinta xun.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Waxaan joojin/ka jari karnaa adeegsiga marka shuruudo la jebiyo.

yourContent.title: Nuxurkaaga
yourContent.body: Adiga ayaa leh xuquuqda nuxurkaaga. Waxaad nagu siinaysaa xuquuqda lagama maarmaanka u ah hawlgalka adeegga (tusaale, gudbin, kaydin, turjumid).

disclaimer.title: Baaq & mas'uuliyad
disclaimer.body: Adeegga waxa lagu bixiyaa “sida uu yahay” iyada oo aan dammaanad lagu darin. Sida sharcigu oggol yahay, Chatforia mas'uul kama noqoneyso khasaare dadban ama daba-socod ah.

changes.title: Isbeddel
changes.body: Waxaan cusboonaysiin karnaa shuruudahaan; isticmaalka joogtada ah kadib cusboonaysiinta waxa uu ka dhigan yahay aqbalid.

doNotSell.title: Ha Iibin ama Ha La Wadaagin Xogtayda Shaqsiga
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ma iibiso xogta shaqsiga. Si kastaba, dadka degan California waxay weli gudbin karaan codsiyo hoosta CPRA adigoo isticmaalaya badhanka hoose.

cookies.title: Dejinta Kukiyada
cookies.body: Chatforia waxa ay isticmaashaa kukiyo kooban (tusaale, fadhi, amni). Ma adeegsanno kukiyada xayeysiiska dhinac-saddexaad. Maamul kukiyada gudaha dejinta biraawsarkaaga.
